title: Google\Cloud\Trace\Reporter\SyncReporter
name: SyncReporter
description: This implementation of the ReporterInterface uses a provided TraceClient to report Traces and their TraceSpans to Stackdriver directly.

methods.name: __construct
methods.description: Create a TraceReporter that uses the provided TraceClient to report.

methods.name: report
methods.description: Report the provided Trace to a backend.
